title: Georgette Heyer's Regency World
description: Georgette Heyer fans will delight in Jennifer Kloesterâ€™s definitive guide to her Regency the people, the shops, clubs and towns they frequented, the parties and seasons they celebrated, how they ate, drank, dressed, socialized, voted, shopped and drove. A fun read for any Heyer fan.
